704079f-a.title: Brooklyn: Elderts Lane - Glenmore Avenue
704079f-a.text:
Elderts Lane, in line of Glenmore Ave., showing the John Drew
house formerly at Old South Road and Eldertc Lane. Eugene L. Ambruster
states that this house was moved to the city line.
Date 7
Eugene L. Ambruster Collection.
704079f-a.folder: Elderts Lane & Glenmore Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

704080f-a.title: Brooklyn: Elderts Lane - Glenmore Avenue
704080f-a.text:
566-570 EldertsLane, west side, between Glenmore and Pitkin Aves., show-
ing in the foreground the home of "Old John Drew", from 186O.1873. This
house formerly stood one block east of its present location at a point where
Old South Road met New Lots Road at Eldert:Lane.
About 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
